about-first-paragraph: Hi! My name is Octavio Sancho, I am a 25 years old Software and Web Developer based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
about-second-paragraph: I have 1 year of experience creating Websites and developing Software Applications, I always keep myself learning new Skills. I usually work with ReactJS, JavaScript, Tailwind.css, Sass, and other technologies.
about-third-paragraph: I truly believe that my strong points lies in development and research , but also I really love designing the applications I create. Currently, I am looking for my first IT experience in a company and focusing on dominate Back-End Technologies. I want to scale up my skills and grow as professional.
